title: Memorial 1-6 + Memorial - Imaginary Fiends 1-9 (Complete) (digit
description:
English | CBR | 15 Issues

Memorial #1-6
Publisher:  IDW
Publication Date:  December 21, 2011 - June 20, 2012

Writer:  Chris Roberson
Artist:  Rich Ellis
Colorist:  Grace Allison
Letterers:  Robbie Robbins (#1-2), Shawn Lee (#3), Neil Uyetake (#4-6)
Cover A:  Michael WM Kaluta
Cover B:  Rich Ellis

MEMORIAL is the story of Em, a young woman who arrives at a hospital in Portland, Oregon with no memory of her past. A year later, she has managed to rebuild her life, finding a job and friends, when her existence is thrown into turmoil after she inherits a magical shop, the kind that appears in an alley one instant and disappears the next. Em finds herself drawn into a supernatural conflict between immortal beings representing the fundamental aspects of the universe itself. All of existence is at stake, and the only things standing in the way of total oblivion are Em, the magical shop, and a talking cat. 

Memorial: Imaginary Fiends #1-9
Publisher:  IDW
Publication Date:  October 3, 2012 - January 23, 2013

Writer:  Chris Roberson
Artist:  Rich Ellis
Colorist:  Grace Allison
Letterer:  Neil Uyetake
Cover:  Rich Ellis

Return to the world of MEMORIAL in "Imaginary Fiends," an all new digital-only 9 part series! The fantasies and fears that seem so real to children are often forgotten in adulthood. But after the events of the first Memorial miniseries, forgotten memories are being recovered all over the world. Can those lost fears and fantasies be far behind? Brought to you by Chris Roberson (EDISON REX, iZOMBIE), Rich Ellis (STARS BELOW, TWILIGHT ZONE), and Grace Allison (WANDER).

Thanks goes to Zone and Son of Ultron for this release.
